titles.title: Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2006
A bill to provide loans and grants for fire sprinkler retrofitting in nursing facilities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 6/9/2006--Introduced. Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2006 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish programs of direct loans and grants for retrofitting nursing facilities with automatic fire sprinkler systems. Gives priority to grant applications that demonstrate a need or hardship.
